EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Building Scalable Data Applications with Spring and GemFire.Rem
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Building Scalable Data Applications with Spring and GemFire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for this week's webinar Building Scalable Data Applications with Spring and GemFire.
If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, January 13, 2015
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=ef196d81136a5508e4997057df9fa1c7f> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 668 463 005
Thank you,
